summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4402 for the improvement of 4th Avenue Northeast, from East 77th Street to East 80th Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52055, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
